public class BasicModuleRegistry

This is the default implementation of the module registry

getModules

public java.util.List<Module> getModules()
Description copied from interface: ModuleRegistry
This will return the list of all prototype that are currently registered in this module registry.

Returns:
the list of all registered modules.

register

public void register(Module module)
Description copied from interface: ModuleRegistry
This will register a new prototype in the module registry. If the prototype was already in the registry, the registration will be ignored.

Specified by:
register in interface ModuleRegistry
Parameters:
module - the module prototype

registered

public boolean registered(Module module)
Description copied from interface: ModuleRegistry
This will return true if the provide prototype is already present in the registry, false otherwise.

Specified by:
registered in interface ModuleRegistry

module - the prototype to be checked
Returns:

unregister

public void unregister(Module module)
Description copied from interface: ModuleRegistry
This will unregister the specified module from the registry. If the module was not already present in the registry the call is ignored.

Specified by:
unregister in interface ModuleRegistry
